plugin.name: Dify Translations
plugin.description: Translate content using Dify AI workflows
dialog.title: Translate with Dify
dialog.content: Select the languages to translate this content into. Translations will be saved as drafts.
dialog.note: Make sure you have saved any changes before translating.
dialog.noLanguages: No target languages available. Make sure you have configured additional locales in Strapi.
dialog.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one language to translate to
notification.saveFirst: Document must be saved before translating
